description: Situated in a secluded street in the town centre, this restaurant run by a couple boasts an elegant dining room with an attractive dark parquet floor. The cuisine is a good example of how to add a light modern touch to local specialities as well as typical Italian dishes, while the menu also includes a few fish-based options. Don’t miss the home-made pasta!
